ack.p: The authors are grateful to Pakistan institute of medical Sciences (PIMS), Islamabad and Benzir Bhutto Hospital (BBH), Rawalpindi for provision of stool samples. Parents and guardians being the study participants, Department of Biosciences COMSATS University Islamabad, Pakistan and the lab of Professor Jelle Matthijnssens, University of Leuven, Belgium for Contributing reagents/materials/analysis tools.
